Headline: Skokie-bound Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition near East Prairie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Skokie-bound Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition near East Prairie

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
